nodes.text: Cargo Port Blueprint was a poster available in the galaxy at some point after the Battle of Yavin during the Galactic Civil War. It depicted a blueprint of a cargo port. The Aurebesh lettering at the top of the poster read "Cargo Port".

Cargo Port Blueprint is a poster that appeared in the the massively multiplayer online roleplaying video game Star Wars Galaxies: An Empire Divided, which was released on June 26, 2003 and shut down on December 15, 2011. It could be used in the player's home as decoration. It was made by collecting all the parts for the "viewscreen printer" item which could be looted from various enemies in the game. When all were collected and combined, it would produce one of three random paintings, the others being Coronet Skyscraper Blueprint and Freedom. With the introduction of the New Game Enhancements in 2005, several items required for the viewscreen printer were made unobtainable, making these paintings valuable collectors items within the game. However, this poster in particular was still available as loot from enemies, making it less valuable than the others.
